definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: If no domain is registered, the money is refunded in full.
sentences.chinese: 如果客戶沒有註冊任何域名，那麼保證金將全部返還。

sentences.english: The applicant is required to submit the Guarantee Fund and Cash Position.
sentences.chinese: 申請人應當向本公司交納結算保證金以及結算備付金。

sentences.english: Blagojevich is freed on his own recognizance.
sentences.chinese: 在交了保證金後被釋放。

sentences.english: Foreign exchange security deposit bargain is 42 stir thousand catty develop a financial product.
sentences.chinese: 描述外匯保證金交易是四兩撥千斤的衍生金融產品。

sentences.english: The company is required to post a bond with the abta.
sentences.chinese: 該公司被要求向英國旅遊代理人協會交保證金。

sentences.english: Please kindly note our company doesn't sell single bond for ISF entry.
sentences.chinese: 注意，我們公司是不賣單票保證金的。

sentences.english: Would you please deposit some money with us?
sentences.chinese: 請先給我們交一些保證金好嗎？

sentences.english: Each level of skill reduces the percentage of ISK placed in market escrow when entering buy orders.
sentences.chinese: 減少下定單購買時投入的購買保證金的比例。

sentences.english: With regards to transactions in CFDs, Clients are required to deposit a Margin with the Company in order to open a position.
sentences.chinese: 在交易差價合約時，客戶需要存入保證金才能開倉。

sentences.english: GFM may change margin requirements at any time.
sentences.chinese: GFM隨時可能改變保證金要求。

sentences.english: Do you understand the nature of margined transactions?
sentences.chinese: 您瞭解以保證金形式繳付的交易嗎？

sentences.english: R trademark application for Taobao Mall store margin of 100000.
sentences.chinese: 商標申請淘寶商城專營店保證金爲10萬。

sentences.english: Party A shall open a receipt for Party B after collecting down payment for lease.
sentences.chinese: 甲方收取租賃保證金，須向乙方開具收據。

sentences.english: If you do not submit a request to move out of the dorms according to these regulations, the deposit will not be returned to you.
sentences.chinese: 若未依規定辦理退離宿手續者，住宿保證金不予退還。

sentences.english: Han Chong want to return the deposit, but was knocked down by security at the door.
sentences.chinese: 韓衝想要回保證金，卻被保安打倒在公司門口。

sentences.english: Recognizance A sum of money pledged to assure the performance of such an act.
sentences.chinese: 確定能實施這一行爲的保證金。

definition: to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
to transfer (money to a bank account)
to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
